name: Language-Aware String Extractor
short_description: Enhanced version of the standard Unix strings(1) program which uses language models for automatic language identification and character-set identification, supporting over 1300 languages, dozens of character encodings, and 4400+ language/encoding pairs.
summary: multi-encoding strings(1) replacement with language identification
